page.title: 05Life Styles
page.content: Lack of Woodland in the area and the undulating terrain is mainly urbanized. Farmland is poor quality & either stock_fattening or m/gardening takes place. A feature is the demise of coalmines, railways and woollen mills;the latter have been converted to light engineering or man made fibres. The Common, scene of a battle in 1643, is a landmark and important area for recreation. Few pre-war houses remain. The first few houses were built late 1930's.In 1955 a private estate,Dean Park was built on open fields.Kingsway Estate,a mixture of flats and private housing built around 1960 on old property and allotments.In 1963 a very large estate,Buckross,built on open fields.Street names like Margetson, Fairfax,Walton & Oakwell reflect local history.
